plot: Pride is Forever is a documentary film that follows the plight of high school runner Anthony Armstrong as he trains and competes during the 2012 track season.
title: Pride Is Forever
plot_es: Pride is Forever is a documentary film that follows the plight of high school runner Anthony Armstrong as he trains and competes during the 2012 track season.
plot_en: Pride is Forever is a documentary film that follows the plight of high school runner Anthony Armstrong as he trains and competes during the 2012 track season.
